overview: Andre CotÃ©’s proven experience in manufacturing, engineering, and research and development enable him to effectively oversee Omni-ID’s product development, product engineering, and R&D activities. He also draws upon his expansive knowledge of global markets to lead the company’s Asian business development efforts. CotÃ© has more than 30 years of experience in the printing and converting industry and has spent 10 years in the field of radio frequency (RF) technology. Prior to joining Omni-ID early in 2008, he served as Senior Director of Worldwide Business Development for Checkpoint Systems, a leading manufacturer and marketer of RFID technology. During his tenure at Checkpoint, CotÃ© held various positions in R&D, manufacturing, engineering, product marketing, and business development for the company’s global tag and label business. Prior to Checkpoint’s acquisition of METO in 2000, he acted as Director of Manufacturing Operations. Andre CotÃ© earned a bachelors degree in Finance and Information Systems from the State University of New York, Buffalo. In addition, he holds several patents in RF and RFID design and manufacturing technology.
